meanings.definition: A basic nitrogenous organic compound produced by the putrefaction of protein.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ptomaines found in decaying meat.
meanings.sent2: Food poisoning can be caused by consuming ptomaines in spoiled food.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the ptomaines in the expired milk were having a party.
meanings.sent4: The smell of ptomaines from the garbage bin filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The presence of ptomaines indicated the meat was no longer safe to eat.

meanings.definition: Any of various amines formed by the action of putrefactive bacteria on proteins.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how ptomaines can result from bacterial activity on meat.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory detected ptomaines in the sample of spoiled fish.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that the ptomaines in the old cheese were throwing a party.
meanings.sent4: The stench of ptomaines filled the kitchen after the meat had been left out.
meanings.sent5: The presence of ptomaines indicated the food had gone bad.
